note: Mostly here to boost photography that brightens my days in the hellscape we humans have made out of this planet. **Photos must have ALT-text to be boosted, the more detailed, the better.** Very occasionally will post my own images too as I relearn the joy of being creative. Profile photo is of a sunset, with palm trees silhouetted against a purple, pink, and yellow sky. Header photo is of a tea bag tag that states, “Love, compassion, and kindness are the anchors of life.”
